comment: When your neighbor who threatens you on a daily basis and is growing in power do you not confront it before it gets out of control or do you wait until they knock on your door ? <URL>
amr:
# ::snt When your neighbor who threatens you on a daily basis and is growing in power do you not confront it before it gets out of control or do you wait until they knock on your door ? <URL>
(a / amr-choice
      :op1 (c / confront-01
            :polarity -
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG1 (n / neighbor
                  :ARG0-of (t / threaten-01
                        :ARG2 y
                        :frequency (r / rate-entity-91
                              :ARG3 (t2 / temporal-quantity
                                    :quant 1
                                    :unit (d / day))))
                  :ARG1-of (g / grow-01
                        :ARG2 (p / power)))
            :time (b / before
                  :op1 (g2 / get-03
                        :ARG1 n
                        :ARG2 (o / out-06
                              :ARG1 n
                              :ARG2 (c2 / control-01
                                    :ARG1 n)))))
      :op2 (w / wait-01
            :ARG1 y
            :time (u / until
                  :op1 (k / knock-01
                        :ARG0 n
                        :ARG1 (d2 / door
                              :poss y)))))

comment: Do you really think the world is so large ? How long does it take for an ICBM to reach our shores ? Are there satellites parked in geosynchronous orbit over the IS that belong to nations on the far side of the world ?
amr:
# ::snt Do you really think the world is so large ? How long does it take for an ICBM to reach our shores ? Are there satellites parked in geosynchronous orbit over the IS that belong to nations on the far side of the world ?
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (t / think-01
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG1 (h / have-degree-91
                  :ARG1 (w / world)
                  :ARG2 (l / large)
                  :ARG3 (s / so))
            :ARG1-of (r / real-04)
            :polarity (a / amr-unknown))
      :snt2 (t2 / take-10
            :ARG0 (r2 / reach-01
                  :ARG0 (m2 / missile
                        :mod (b / ballistic)
                        :mod (ii / intercontinental))
                  :ARG1 (s2 / shore
                        :poss (w2 / we)))
            :ARG1 (a2 / amr-unknown))
      :snt3 (p / park-01
            :ARG1 (s3 / satellite
                  :ARG0-of (b2 / belong-01
                        :ARG1 (n / nation
                              :location (s4 / side
                                    :mod (f / far)
                                    :part-of (w3 / world)))))
            :ARG2 (o / orbit-01
                  :mod (g / geosynchronous))
            :location (o2 / over
                  :op1 (p2 / product
                        :name (n2 / name
                              :op1 "ISA"))))
      :polarity (a3 / amr-unknown))
